name: ColorTiles
description:
Train your reflexes with this amazing app, click all the blocks and achieve the highest score.

But be careful, avoid the blocks of the wrong color !

Enjoy three different game modes:

-CLASSIC-HARD-RUN-

Behind the simple gameplay and the minimalist design hides a game that requires great concentration.

*Language available: italian (english in the future)
